wikipedia_page.main: Harry Davies was an English footballer who played as a forward for Chorley, Port Vale, and Bacup Borough.

response: *Harry Davies (footballer, born in Chorley) (fl. 1922–1923), English footballer for Chorley, Port Vale and Bacup Borough
